actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a tax on every new automobile with respect to its fuel consumption rate, to provide for public disclosure of the fuel consumption rate of every new automobile, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, for a tax on every new automobile with respect to its fuel consumption rate. Requires public disclosure of the fuel consumption rate of every new automobile. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 4064)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a tax on every new automobile with respect to its fuel consumption rate, to provide for public disclosure of the fuel consumption rate of every new automobile, and for other purposes.
